body.p: NEMSIS contains null values not listed in HL7. â€œNot applicableâ€� maps directly to â€œNot applicable,â€� but â€œNot recordedâ€� and â€œNot reportedâ€� must be represented as the general concept â€œNo information.â€� These values may also be copied into Observation.text.

Some of the negative action values, however, are actually null values, and are recorded as â€œNI,â€� no information. A mapping of negative action values is provided in Appendix B.
